name: Kattch
description:
Kattch is the brainchild of the young game developers at Indie Games Studios, made as a Game-Jam project during the span of thirty-six hours. The game features an original soundtrack and deeply engaging gameplay perfect for friendly competition.

Play as a cat chasing a moving laser pointer across platforms against a colorful background with inspiration from street art. As you play the game your only enemy is the ticking clock and your only ally your reflexes and ability to quickly navigate the platforms in as efficient a manner as possible to reach the target.

Catching the laser pointer will score you points and extra time, the more time you have remaining when you catch the laser pointer, the more points you'll score. As you catch the laser pointer repeatedly it'll start moving faster and faster, increasing in difficulty.

The game is perfect for challenging a friend who has better hand-eye coordination and can score the most points before time runs out

Click to move between platforms
